title: Replace header logo with official LG Electronics logo image

requirements.text: Replace the Header component logo with the official LG Electronics logo image asset (showing the circular red LG symbol with gray 'LG' text), maintaining the existing header layout and structure
acceptanceCriteria: The Header component displays the official LG Electronics logo image (circular red symbol with 'LG' text) instead of the current SVG implementation
Logo maintains appropriate size and spacing within the header layout
Logo is properly aligned with the wrench icon and tagline
Image asset is optimized for web display with appropriate dimensions

constraints: Do not modify the Header component layout structure
Maintain the existing tagline and wrench icon placement
Preserve the LG Heritage Red (#A50034) color scheme
nonGoals: Changing other branding elements beyond the header logo
Altering the overall page theme or styling

required: Official LG Electronics logo with circular red symbol and gray 'LG' text on transparent or white background (lg-logo.dim_400x150.png)
